website_summaries.verdict: For simple, travel-size smoothie making, look to the affordable Hamilton Beach Stay or Go Blender, but you'll have to spend more for hard-core food processing.
pros: The inexpensive Hamilton Beach Stay or Go Blender creates blends smoothies that travel, plus it can grind beans and other solid foods in its special cup
The blender is also dishwasher-friendly and easy to clean by hand
cons: With a weak electric motor, short blades, and all-plastic parts, the Stay or Go will neither tackle tough blending tasks nor impress appliance style hounds

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: IT CAUGHT ON FIRE. I wouldn't recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.text: MAJOR EDIT. FIVE USES IN, IT CAUGHT ON FIRE. Not kidding. I had to unplug and throw it into the sink and pour water on it. Smoke filled kitchen, fire alarms going off, entire house smells like burnt pastic. How can they sell this junk?? Emailing farberware. Not Amazon's fault, but holy smokes, this product is hot. So, it's tiny. It's underpowered. The lid isn't 100% secure. It's overpriced. I'm seriously disappointed. Wally's world has a store brand one for half the cost that is serving me way better...
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: As cheap as you'd expect...
customer_reviews.text: The blender struggles to blend the simplest items, even a yogurt based drink takes multiple minutes and leaves your kitchen smelling like burnt rubber. Every time I want to use the blender, I have to shake the whole thing as I blend and must continually tighten the base (because the vibrations will loosen the fit and cause a major mess). The motor is also very loud. I'm a college student and require thrifty purchases, but this is a waste of money. Do yourself a favor and spend the extra $30.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend or purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make smoothies, and the first two came out great, but when attempting to make the third (consecutive days, not all on one day), the motor started smoking and almost started a fire in my kitchen. I did not overload it or use anything different in the smoothies. It was such a huge disappointment and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this blender! Proud owner of a Vitamix here, I needed something a little smaller as the vitamix takes up a lot of counter space. This little guy is awesome. I would NOT suggest/use all frozen fruits to make a smoothie with this, it’s not powerful enough. I defrosted my fruits for my smoothie and I used a couple frozen fruit pieces to substitute for ice, with a scoop of nature’s bounty vitamin and protein mix. It was smooth and delicious! Also this little guy doesn’t make that much noise!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this blender. I use the blade for both the larger cup but also the individual bottles. I didn't realize it was only one speed, but I only use it for smoothies so I don't mind. It cleans easily. I've left stuff in it for days before and it still cleans quickly and easily. I love it. And I thought it was a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Etaz

customer_reviews.title: Few imperfections, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for anyone that wants to make morning smoothies to go. The only annoying bit is that the to go lids have a bit of a rim on the inside from poor molding and there isn't a breath hole. A quick drill and some sandpaper fixes it up pretty quickly though.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Basic, but still everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, I gave the canisters a rinse and had a smoothie. It was great! I was worried about washing the blade but everything disassembles and reassembles very easily. That's the only component that needs any disassembling. Everything is very easy to wash. The two to go containers are perfect for my post workout protein smoothie
customer_reviews.author: Lizaderp

customer_reviews.title: Love the multipe sizes
customer_reviews.text: I love that I have the option of using different sizes of blending containers, I hate using a huge blender cup when you only have a little bit of salsa or something like that to blend so this was great, the blender is fairly strong, I blend lots of peppers and with other blenders I have problems with getting dried peppers to blend completely and this little blender did a good job. I like that you don't have to hold the button for it to stay on like you do with some of the other little blenders, I got this to replace a smoothie blender and I'm glad I did because it's so much more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: RSP - busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: If you want something lightweight this blender is easy to put away if you do not have space in your kitchen. It only has two speeds. It is simple but you have to chop well the fruits if you are doing a shake or smoothie. Also, the buttons are very sensitive so make sure they are in the off position before you plug it in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: it was broken when I got it and the box was crushed looking for a new plastic jug to be able to use it I used it once when I first got it and there was a huge mess all over my counter cuz of the crack I didn't see in the top of it and the sides of the plastic container you put it all in ...so haven't used it since. I threw away the box n couldn't sent it back the handle is broke off it completely so you cant really use it as I would. beside it leaks
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn  Lee white

customer_reviews.title: This blender kind of sucks, I mean it gets the job done eventually ...
customer_reviews.text: This blender kind of sucks, I mean it gets the job done eventually but all I use it for is smoothies and it doesn’t mix the top ingredients with the bottom in a timely manner. I usually have to open it up and stir it up with a spoon. I shouldn’t have to do that. Also it’s really difficult to change out the blade to the portable drink cups, so I don’t even bother using them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica W.

customer_reviews.title: Pure Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a week and it already leaks. It doesn't matter which size you are using but the fittings are loose and there is no seal so after about the 3rd day of using it, the leaks started. It became unusable after a week or so. Hamilton Beach used to make good products at a decent price but this blender and a coffee maker I bought from them a while back both became unusable within weeks. Sad this company had dropped off so much in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Good value!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and use it all the time! It is so easy to use and clean! I love making smoothies in it but I also make all my baby food in it. Love that it only has one function- on or off. I also liked the price and quality of the product. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful but that's what you get for the money paid
customer_reviews.text: Did not paid a lot for this Blender but even at that price, it does not meet expectations. I tried blending a cantaloupe, granola and water and it is unable without help. It basically blends whatever is around the blades and then you have to continually open the container and move contents around before starting it off again. It took a good 20 minutes to blend 2 cups worth of food into a smoothie. I tried a few other things like pineapples, apples, and berries into smoothies and the same thing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Definitely great for smoothies
customer_reviews.text: It’s awesome to have the top you can put right one. I got this over the magic gullet because the cup is much bigger and fits the amount of smoothie I like to make. The blades are easy to clean but confusing to put back together(which really isn’t an issue at all). The buttons are easy to accidentally turn on and that can be starteling. Just don’t leave the blade on the machine while it isn’t in use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic blender
customer_reviews.text: A basic blender good for morning smoothies and blending other things but not a very powerful one so don’t try anything like ice or anything else this is not a ninja blender it’s just a basic blender for basic smoothies
customer_reviews.author: Drewster

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little blender. I make smoothies in it just about every day. Make sure that you're adding enough liquid, and use pulse to chop up frozen fruit/ice. Sometimes when I blend in the cup I have to take it off the blender and give it a little shake to move stuff around, but it's not a big deal to do so.
customer_reviews.author: SMacG

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Best used for making smoothies, not really good to be used as a standard "Blender" because it just is not strong enough, but as a smoothie maker i rate it 100%. That was my purpose for buying this product to make smoothies, so all is good. I do recommend this product for smoothies and a great price. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Norris G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about buying this after reading reviews. I’ve only had it for a week and so far it’s working perfectly. So much easier to make smoothies than the Ninja I’ve been using!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. This is the worst blender ever made. The blade is extremely tiny. Only 1 speed and cannot even blend 2 frozen strawberries . It has added 15 minutes getting ready for work because I have to cut the strawberries into tiny pieces before it will blend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This was a great little blender for about 3 months when we used ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little blender for about 3 months when we used it for primarily fresh, softly frozen or almost thawed fruits and yogurt. Frozen fruit with yogurt and milk killed it, absolutely burned up the motor and filled our house with a stinky burning smell.. I am disappointed in this product and will not buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: motor started smoking on third use, like others have said
customer_reviews.text: aweful. i bought it for the price and because i assumed hamilton veach was a trustworthy brand. i wish i read the reviews! mine started smoking on third use and almost caused a fire in my kitchen. this is no joke. There was a strange plasticy smell on the first use, I had hoped it was no big deal just a new machine smell but DO NOT TRUST IT. luckily this happened within a week of purchase so I am sending it back. DON'T buy this blender!
customer_reviews.author: KittyZ

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: this is so cool product the only down side is that does not have a handle so is a bit complicate it to serve into your cups but other than that is so easy to make your juices and easy to turn it on and off
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Normal
customer_reviews.text: Regular Blender works fine for my fitness needs. But my wife doesn't liked it. Probably will buy new and expensive one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Tural Mehdiyev

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be made with glass but its plastic. It work well. Its very simple. An on switch thats also a pulse. There's no handle which kind of sucks. The cups are pretty good. The part you drink out of doesnt have a cover so be careful. Its only been used for smoothies and frozen drinks ans it does good. Overall I cant complain because it didnt cost much
customer_reviews.author: Que

customer_reviews.title: Slow & doesn't blend fully
customer_reviews.text: This blender takes forever to blend ingredients (that I even cut up super small) & once it has blended everything is still chunky. If I could go back in time I wouldn't have ordered this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Eltzroth

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Its a cheap inexpensive blender with sippy cups for adults ;) Blend some berries and your protein just fine...probably do fine with ice chips, but large cubes, probably wont be ideal. Its ALL plastic minus the blades, so in time I am sure the plastic will fail...but if I get a year or two out of it...so be it.
customer_reviews.author: Myra M.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic blender.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so this is a simple blender for simple easy jobs. Don't think that in purchasing this that you are getting some super high powered blender. In my house, we use it to make our smoothies. It does the job, takes a bit of time but, for the price, it's a good blender. I do think that next time, I will go for something with more power.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not great not terrible
customer_reviews.text: It’s not bad but I constantly have to turn it off and stir it up a bit. Doesn’t blend things too easily. Forget about adding ice. I like the travel container but wish the lid was closed. Spilled all over my car.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tjaden

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful. First one we ordered arrived with a rattle sound. Turns out the motor was already broken into pieces before it shipped. Got a replacement one and truly only used it for smoothies with fresh fruit, not even frozen fruit and after 3 months it just died suddenly. The motor won't even work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Can't Blend Ice
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this blender to make simple smoothies with ice, banana, fruit, yogurt, etc. From the start it had difficulty chopping anything solid. It reeks like burnt metal, and the smell has never gone away after almost a year of use. I am upgrading today to a better brand. Don't try to save your money on a cheap blender, the blades and motor are very weak and it can hardly make a smoothie.
customer_reviews.author: Sarena Wing

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I have bought several blenders and juicers and none have worked well. This one comes with the 2 travel cups that you can blend smoothies in by simply switching the blade to the cups. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on May 21, 2018, and it don’t work anymore. I gave it 3 stars because at the beginning it worked perfect....truly disappointed when I was ready to make my shake,had to buy another one but different maker.
customer_reviews.author: kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean. Great quality for the price. Comes with essential pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item with many uses
customer_reviews.text: This was a great blender but what’s really stuck around are the cup and lids set
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this blender about 2 weeks ago. We used for the first time yesterday and it started smoking and selling like something was burning, plus it started leaking and everything from the blender was every where. We instantly through it in the trash, that's where it belongs!!! I recommend spending more money and a better blender..
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: ... 2 years ago for making smoothies and it worked great for my husband and I
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 years ago for making smoothies and it worked great for my husband and I. Eventually the spinner got worn out so I bought a new one. For the price it does a great job and I like that it comes with so many pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Book M Lover

customer_reviews.title: Not enough power for frozen fruit
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't powerful enough to blend frozen fruit so I have to thaw first. Cups lids are not closed so can't be packed for lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I should of known better after reading the reviews. This product is god awful! Do not buy this! It will not blend a smoothie. It just makes a bunch of motor noise with no blade action. Constantly have to shake it to hope for the best. And while praying that its not going to catch fire. The smell this thing put off was horrid.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Kohler

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving product/fake.
customer_reviews.text: The jar and container appear to be pure plastic, although it says it's BPA free it's without the Logo on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Worth a lot more than the price
customer_reviews.text: Ok for the price you might think it's a dud or a cheapie but no! Buy it. I have been making smoothies and it blends through oats and ice and whole almost easily. Today I made carrot ginger apple juice. All are very fibrous and it made easy change out of it! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: MrsandMr

customer_reviews.title: It didn't BLEND well for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing the Green Smoothie Cleanse and the ingredients needed to make several of the smoothies would not all blend in the blender, due to being to small. I had to blend the ingredients in 2 parts and then mix together, due to some ingredients not being broken down/ processed i.e.. frozen strawberries and bananas. The cups/ smoothie containers were efficient, however if a lid or cover for the opening would be better for travel. Had to purchase a different smoothie/ blender due to the longer process in the morning of having to blend the ingredients in batches, then together.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Yhap

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love love the cups and the lids, easy to clean. Sometimes the cups slip out which makes me question how durable it is and how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: This Hamilton beach blender with the stay and go cups is awesome. My husband makes his protien shakes on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a blender to do a little bit of everything. This Hamilton beach blender with the stay and go cups is awesome. My husband makes his protien shakes on the to go cups, he throws in oatmeal and fruit and takes with him to the gym. So far I have used to make my own salsa and it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Elvyban

customer_reviews.title: Made of lightweight material so it is easy for her to handle and the small size fits ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for my mom for her birthday and she absolutely loves it. Made of lightweight material so it is easy for her to handle and the small size fits perfectly on her counter without taking up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nikki

customer_reviews.title: works great. Easy clean
customer_reviews.text: works great fits in cabinet out of the way when not in use
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy with the given price range
customer_reviews.text: - superb design - sufficiently powerful - 4 jars of different sizes (durable transparent plastic) - easy to clean - only one blade included - good enough for smoothies and shakes
customer_reviews.author: galaxy owner

customer_reviews.title: Burger friendly, defiantly not quality wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap thin plastic appliance. I’ll keep it in case I want to make something simple. It does not crush ice and it’s small
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: very small.
customer_reviews.text: the "large" part of the blender is very small. contents do not fill a mason jar. i wanted it because the thought of being able to take the portable cups was appealing. i would return it, but the box got thrown away. there is also only one button option.
customer_reviews.author: alittleaboutalot

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it it started smoking, I was only using it for a few minutes and smelled burning plastic. After it was off and unplugged it continued to smoke so I took it outside. It even left my countertop hot in just those few minutes. Highly disappointed!! The cups are nice but the blender was junk, for me at least!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Meyer

customer_reviews.title: I love this blender and it very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender and it very easy to use. It also comes with various sizes of jars so I can make my smoothies and vary the size that I want to drink
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Not a full sized blender, not very powerful either but it does the trick for smoothies. I feel like the motor is going to go out pretty quick though, wish I would have spent a little more and got something else but I’m making it work as long as I can!
customer_reviews.author: Aqua Lotus!

customer_reviews.title: Weak power. The cups aren’t all that useful.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t get to all the food. It will just blend whatever is on the bottom 50% of what you put in. You have to shake it in order to move the food around so it can blend it.
customer_reviews.author: ThanksObama

customer_reviews.title: Ok Blender
customer_reviews.text: This is just a ok blender. It does not crush the ice very well. Blender is cheap. Looking for something much more better and stronger.
customer_reviews.author: charisse vega

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: Love this little blender. It does great with crushing ice in smoothies which I didn't expect. Works better than my ninja ever did. Only thing I would change would be to make the lids on the travel containers seal.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten S

customer_reviews.title: Refund was quick and fast.
customer_reviews.text: Was a good blender while it worked, but just quite turning on one day, I used every day but only for 2 weeks then it quite. Returned for full refund. Bought a different kind, so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Suzan Mullican

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best at blending fresh vegetables and frozen fruit
customer_reviews.text: Price was good , and now I see why... I just finally got a chance to use this blender for smoothies.... It doesn't blend well, you literally have to work with it and I am disappointed. I just opened box to use blender and I cant return it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this. I thought the to go cups would be nice but it doesn't make up for the loss of power. It left ice cube chunks as well as chunks of frozen strawberries in my smoothies. Kind of defeats the purpose of a smoothie
customer_reviews.author: tmcguire

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but chunks of fruit and stuff fall the blender and gets stuck or missed, so I have to open it and stir and then rebound again. If I would’ve known I wouldn’t have purchased it, but for now it’ll do.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Low price low quality
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t blend well seams to be underpowered. It also looks as though substandard materials used in manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the price but won't blend ice on the first try
customer_reviews.text: Great with all the attachments but you'll rarely use the small shaker thing cause it's just too small. I use it to blend up fruit smoothies with ice and I constantly have to take it off the stand and shake it up by hand then put it back on. Great buy for the price but you'll have to do some of the work yourself.
customer_reviews.author: ExpertReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well so long as you don't have too ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well so long as you don't have too much in the well for the motor and blades to handle - then it can get a bit hot and you can definitely tell by the smell. The parts are a bit hard to clean, but being dishwasher safe definitely helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Buckowing

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used first time and motor smells like its burning. Not so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: samantha akers

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for over an year. Still in very good shape. I use it to make my bulletproof coffee every single morning. Wonderful product
customer_reviews.author: Katniss

customer_reviews.title: The cups are a nice add on
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The blender doesnt mix well unless you add alot of water. The cups are a nice add on, but the lids leak. I've been using this for a month for shakes in the morning and it takes forever to blend properly. Next time Id just invest in a decent blender.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia K.

customer_reviews.title: lids don't close!
customer_reviews.text: The blender is better than average for the price; ive had it for a year and it's still running strong . But the stupid cups it comes with don't have LIDS that CLOSE. They are permanently open. Even the one with a twisty top (pictured ont he smallest cup in the image) is completely insecure. So don't even think about "go"-ing anywhere with those...
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice and then it fell apart. The bottom where the blade is attached fell off and it would no longer work after that. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender plus so much more
customer_reviews.text: This blender is amazing. I like to make my own salad dressings and ice cream. It's the perfect one-stop shop for prep and storage. Also, I use the cups for measuring, as the have measurements on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Bye Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it has the different size containers so you can make a precise amount of liquids ! Definitely an upgrade from my old blender. The only thing I don’t like is that you only have two options on the blender for the type of blend it’s nothing that seriously bothers me but if there were other options it would be even better! Other than that no complaints would highly recommend for a compact affordable blender.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reddrick

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not good for ice, large pieces of anything, or thick stuff. Get what you pay for basically.
customer_reviews.author: Dana F

customer_reviews.title: Burned out within 5 days of making smoothies..
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on Jan 1 2016 and used to do JJ Smith's 10 day Smoothie Cleanse. Used greens, frozen fruit, protein powder and other recipe ingredients only; never used ice, however, the blender burned out and died around day 5 of the cleanse. Thank goodness I had an older blender stored away to finish the rest of the program. I do NOT recommend this blender.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Brown

customer_reviews.title: Going to be perfect for our camper this spring and great right now ...
customer_reviews.text: Going to be perfect for our camper this spring and great right now for both me and husband protein energy drinks before gym workout. Really like the portable small but, powerful for our small travel trailer right now too.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: makes delicious drinks
customer_reviews.text: We have been making blended fruit drinks constantly with this thing.. Works great.. It's no jack lelane but it is an awesome blender
customer_reviews.author: Chuck and Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great price, value, and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This blender is simple to use and easy to clean. There aren't any frills with it, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: James Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Love this blender
customer_reviews.text: My shakes come out nice and thick in the cups and blends really good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Roman

customer_reviews.title: Many time reviews
customer_reviews.text: Stop working after a couple of month. I still have the cuts
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Brisson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little blender
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little blender for the price. I love that it doesn't take up much space on my counter top. I'm a little disappointed that I can not use a mason jar or any other brand with it but it's still a great little blender for smoothies and frozen mixed drinks.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact blender
customer_reviews.text: Small and efficient. Perfect for exactly what I bought it for: smoothies, milkshakes and alcoholic beverages. Not a heavy duty blender but you get what you pay for and it's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenine

customer_reviews.title: Great value and great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money. I tried to order an additional one but the seller had ran out of them. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoking Motor
customer_reviews.text: I so excited to receive my blender and thought Hamilton Beach was a good brand but I literally only used this blender 5 times before it started smoking and the motor went out. Very dissatisfied and disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Zion

customer_reviews.title: No good.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blender a little over a month ago. Already it started to smoke and smell of plastic. I quickly unplugged it from the wall. Not safe in my opinion. Will not continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: N.F

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I'll recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my nephew and he loved. He even send me a clip of him using it.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Replacement Product
customer_reviews.text: I Love my new Hamilton Beach Stay or go. Already used to make milkshakes. Plenty of other uses as well. Would definitely recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: PLP

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm the two whole times she used it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife several months ago. Worked like a charm the two whole times she used it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Horton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I Love just how easy it is to use & CLEAN.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. I have had no problems with it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. I have had no problems with it since purchasing over six months ago. The motor is powerful and there are no leaks in any of the containers. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap and the bottom part that's under the blender where you connect it to the blender for it to spin fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and easy to clean. 4 stars because the tumblers aren't very easy to drink out of, and leak when closed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking and only used it like ten times!
customer_reviews.text: It's very easy to use and easy to clean, but I was disappointed by how long I was able to use it. I bought the blender last year, but didn't use it much, probably only around ten times, and towards the end it started smelling weird, and then it started smoking. I expected it to last much longer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: The way its built the cup sometimes doesn't sit right so when you turn it on it jumps up off the base. What happened to me is that it jumped up one to manu times and knocked out all the rubber teeth that connects the blade to the base. Save yourself the heartache because when it worked it was wonderful. On a positive note Amazon returns could not be easier.
customer_reviews.author: M. Aquarius Ross, PHD

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This was a good buy, I like all the accessories. It is a bit difficult to clean the blades completely, food gets stuck between the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Sullivan-Haasz

customer_reviews.title: Fire Hazard!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this 4 times, and the 4th time it started smoking and blowing little plastic piece out of the fan part. I had to put it outside because even after unplugging and taking apart it was still smoking. I wouldnt buy this and if I could return it, I absolutely would!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lawton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, at a great price. Will buy it again, for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Lasted less than 2 weeks. It had a bit of a burning smell when doing shakes but when I tried cheese (as per the instructions) it completely smoked. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Berger

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blender originally for the price point, it works decently. Doesn’t crush ice as finely as I like for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: This is a good vendor for its price
customer_reviews.text: This is a good vendor for its price. Works well. Unless you want to blend the ingredients very very finely, this will do the job. Plus you can blend your shake directly into the mugs / glasses that come with the blender and it makes everything so much convenient.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great blender at at a marvellous price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, just what I expected. Works great. And the small glasses fit prerfectly well in my car glass trays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for families!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite blender yet. We make a lot of smoothies & milkshakes but the kids like different flavors than the adults do. I make the kids shakes in the 32 oz, my husband's protein shake in the 16oz and my fruit smoothie in the other 16oz. Thanks to the versatility of this awesome blender set now I can easily make everybody's shakes and smoothies in minutes! We use this all the time and absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steffany

customer_reviews.title: efficient
customer_reviews.text: Very efficent for my margaritas nights. It crush the ice to the perfect slushies. Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: alfredo Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Love it. small footprint
customer_reviews.text: Love it. small footprint, good quality, use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian's Mom

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Stay or Go Blender with 32oz Jar, 8oz Grinder for Nuts & Spices, and 2 Portable Cups with Drinking Lids for Shakes and Smoothies, BPA Free, Black and Silver (52400)
product_meta.description: Color:Black and SilverThe Hamilton Beach stay or go blender combines the practicality of a full-size blender with the convenience of a single-serve. It can easily make smoothies, puree sauces or grind hard cheeses. With four containers included, This blender is the perfect size for every job. The 32 oz. Jar is large enough to serve the family and two 16 oz. Travel Cups with drinking lids are just the right size for smoothies on the go. Additionally, the 8 oz. Cup can be used for chopping or finely grinding and with the included Shaker lid you can bring it to the table for serving.
feature_bullets: Complete two-piece set: Large 32 oz. Full size blender with lid, 2 16 oz. Personal blenders with travel lids, and one 8 oz. Chopper with Shaker lid.
Great for food and drinks: make milkshakes and morning smoothies to food preparation tasks such as pureeing, dicing, chopping and grinding. Great for salsa, grinding nuts and milkshake add-ins too.
Dishwasher safe shatterproof BPA-free containers: all of the included containers are made of shatterproof Tritan that is crystal clear, lightweight, dishwasher safe, and BPA-free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,383 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
